Package it.polimi.ingsw.events

Class RequestEvent

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.events.RequestEvent
public class RequestEvent extends Object
Event fired by a RequestListenable to RequestListeners

    • RequestEvent

      public RequestEvent(String propertyName, int playerId, int... values)
      Constructor for an event with variables numbers of int parameters
      Parameters:
      propertyName - name of the action to be performed
      playerId - client's id
      values - various numbers to be sent with the event
